divs: Sighting Detailsit looked like it was coming in my direction, there were neighbors looking up at it as well. it looked like it could have been something on fire, but, it was not coming in a downward direction. I grabbed a small pair of binoculers and I could see a large orange shape with a short (about one and a half times the shape) tail also bright orange like fire. I noticed it seemed to stop moving, then began going in the other direction but more like a v pattern. it was certainly too bright to be an airplane, and did not continue its course to be a meteor.

Summary: A large orange object with an orange tail, traveling slowly toward me, then began going the other way. Looked like a meteor, but it changed directions.
